hero.title: Unlock Your Future with AI Palm Reading
hero.subtitle: Advanced artificial intelligence meets ancient palmistry wisdom
hero.description: Upload your palm photo, enter your birth date, and discover personalized insights about your love life, career path, health, and unique personality traits.

how_it_works.title: How Palm AI Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Advanced Technology Meets Ancient Wisdom
how_it_works.description: Our cutting-edge AI technology analyzes your palm lines and combines them with astrological insights to provide accurate, personalized readings.
how_it_works.step1_description: Take a clear photo of your palm using your smartphone or camera. Our AI works with any lighting condition.
how_it_works.step2_description: Provide your birth date to enhance the reading with astrological insights and planetary influences.
how_it_works.step3_description: Our advanced AI examines your palm lines, mounts, and patterns with precision beyond human capability.
how_it_works.step4_description: We combine palm reading with your birth chart for comprehensive insights into your personality and future.
how_it_works.step5_description: Receive a detailed report covering love, career, health, and personality with actionable insights.
how_it_works.privacy_description: All photos are processed securely and automatically deleted after analysis. We never store your personal images.

features.title: Comprehensive Palm Analysis
features.subtitle: Discover Every Aspect of Your Life
features.description: Our AI analyzes multiple aspects of your palm to provide insights into different areas of your life.
features.love_description: Discover your romantic compatibility, relationship patterns, and future love prospects through heart line analysis.
features.career_description: Uncover your professional strengths, ideal career paths, and success potential through fate and head line reading.
features.health_description: Get insights into your physical and mental health tendencies through life line and mount analysis.
features.personality_description: Understand your core personality traits, strengths, and areas for growth through comprehensive palm analysis.
features.testimonial_1: "Incredibly accurate! The AI picked up details about my personality that even I didn't realize."
features.testimonial_2: "The career insights helped me make a major life decision. Highly recommended!"
features.testimonial_3: "Amazing technology. The relationship analysis was spot-on with my current situation."

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our AI palm reading service.
faq.question_1: How accurate is AI palm reading?
faq.answer_1: Our AI has been trained on thousands of palm readings and achieves a 95% accuracy rate. The system combines traditional palmistry knowledge with modern machine learning to provide highly accurate insights.
faq.question_2: What kind of photo should I upload?
faq.answer_2: Upload a clear, well-lit photo of your palm with fingers slightly spread. The photo should show your entire palm from wrist to fingertips. Both indoor and outdoor lighting work fine.
faq.question_3: How long does the analysis take?
faq.answer_3: Our AI processes your palm reading in under 2 minutes. You'll receive your detailed report immediately after the analysis is complete.
faq.question_4: Is my data secure and private?
faq.answer_4: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption to protect your data. Your palm photos are automatically deleted after analysis, and we never share your personal information with third parties.
faq.answer_5: Yes! You can get readings for different hands or update your reading as your life changes. Premium and Lifetime packages include multiple readings.
faq.question_6: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer_6: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay through our secure Stripe payment system.
faq.answer_7: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your reading, contact our support team for a full refund.
faq.contact_support: Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
